committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: To consider the impacts of major Federal actions on the oceans and Great Lakes, the atmosphere, and other aspects of the global environment.

summary.text: Amends the National Environmental Policy Act of 1969 to require all environmental impact statements on proposed Federal actions to include the impacts of such actions on the ocean and Great Lakes, the atmosphere, and the global environment.

titles.title: To consider the impacts of major Federal actions on the oceans and Great Lakes, the atmosphere, and other aspects of the global environment.
